python.title: Python
python.description: The language I know the most, by far. I would say I'm very proficient at it. I started really coding in Python in 2020 during lockdown, but I had learned the basics a few years before that.

html.title: HTML/CSS, Javascript
html.description: I have not had any formal lessons about HTML/CSS or JS in my studies yet, but I coded many personal web projects, allowing me to gather consequent knowledge about these languages.

css.title: HTML/CSS, Javascript
css.description: I have not had any formal lessons about HTML/CSS or JS in my studies yet, but I coded many personal web projects, allowing me to gather consequent knowledge about these languages.

js.title: HTML/CSS, Javascript
js.description: I have not had any formal lessons about HTML/CSS or JS in my studies yet, but I coded many personal web projects, allowing me to gather consequent knowledge about these languages.

php.title: PHP
php.description: I did a few projects involving PHP, PDO, sqlite3, but I wouldn't say I'm an expert at it.

arduino.title: Arduino, Processing
arduino.description: I started my coding adventure with Arduino, in 2018 or before, I can't remember exactly.

processing.title: Arduino, Processing
processing.description: I started my coding adventure with Arduino, in 2018 or before, I can't remember exactly.

c.title: C, C++
c.description: I coded small projects in C++, but I mainly focused on C, for example during 6 months in 2024 as part of my studies.

cpp.title: C, C++
cpp.description: I coded small projects in C++, but I mainly focused on C, for example during 6 months in 2024 as part of my studies.

cs.title: C#
cs.description: I spent a year, in 2023-2024, learning C# as part of my studies.

caml.title: OCaml
caml.description: I also spent a year studying OCaml, mainly for formal algorithm classes in 2023-2024.

java.title: Java
java.description: I worked with Java for 6 months in 2025, when I went to Ireland (University of Limerick) as part of my studies. I know how to code in Java alright, but I hate it so sorry if you only work with Java ¯\_(ツ)_/¯.
